emuInput.TitMainTitle: Group portrait of thirteen women wearing hats, members of the Interdenominational Ministers Wives, front row from left: Mrs. J. C. Hairston, Mrs. H. H. Gaines, Mrs. J. H. Williams, Mrs. J. G. Harris, Mrs. W. E. Green, Mrs. G. L. Bowick, and Mrs. J. B. Cayce; back row: Mrs. J. A. Williams, Mrs. James E. White, Mrs. B. S. Mason, Mrs. W. H. McCreary III, Mrs. R. W. Twiggs, and Mrs. W. J. Moncrieff, posed behind banquet table at Bethel AME Church, another version
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 12, 1962, pg. 20, reads: "Luncheon Hostess - When the Interdenominational Ministers Wives hosted their brilliant spring luncheon recently at Bethel AME Church, some of the principal promoters were, left to right, first row: Mmes. J. C. Hairston, H. H. Gaines, J. H. Williams, J. G. Harris, the president; W. E. Green, G. L. Bowick and J. B. Cayce. Back row: Mmes. J. A. Williams, James E. White, B. S. Mason, W. H. McCreary III, R. W. Twiggs and W. J. Moncrieff. - Harris Photo"
